Absorb <mag> points of health per second from the target.
Your charity helps you focus more.
Your claw-like nails deal <mag> more damage.
Drained targets take <mag>% more damage and lose all their magicka.
You gain a <mag> stamina, deal <2> more damage and your power attacks cost <mag>% less.
You gain a <mag>% damage reduction and you deal <mag>% more two-handed power attack damage.
Increases your Magicka by <mag> points.
You're filled up on energy! You gain a <mag> buff to health. You also move 10% of that slower.
Targets that fail to resist are paralyzed for <dur> seconds.
You feel satiated. You lose less energy over time. Your magicka and stamina are increased by <mag> points.
You are ethereal and move <mag>% faster.
Your sneak is increased by <mag>% and you deal more sneak attack damage with melee weapons.
You cannot regenerate health on your own.
You are starving! You no longer regenerate Magicka.
You are starving! You no longer regenerate Stamina.

You increase your maximum energy level by 100. Getting above 100 does not strengthen most abilities.
SkillSuccubusBaseLevel >= 20.0

You increase your maximum energy level by 200 more. Getting above 100 does not strengthen most abilities. (400 max)
SkillSuccubusBaseLevel >= 50.0

You increase your maximum energy level by 600 more. Getting above 100 does not strengthen most abilities. (1000 max)
SkillSuccubusBaseLevel >= 80.0

You can no longer regenerate health. Below 0 Energy you can no longer regenerate stamina and magicka. At -100 Energy you enter a feeding frenzy, which increases damage taken by an insane amount and you force yourself onto the first person you can drain.

You can regenerate health again at 50 or more energy.
TSSD_Base_MagickaRegenFix None 1.0
TSSD_Base_StaminaRegenFix None 1.0
